text: Ba'ze az in pajomʙaroni giromiqadrro ʙar ʙa'ze digar ʙartarī dodem. Alloh ʙo ʙa'ze suxan guft. (ʙa monandi Mūso va Muhammad alajhissalom.) Va Alloh ʙa'zero ʙa daraçote olī ʙolo kard. (Ba monandi Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) ki risolati vaj ʙaroi hamai mardum va xotami pajomʙaron ast va ummataşro ʙar tamomi ummathoi guzaşta ʙuzurg gardond va ƣajra.) Va ʙa Iso pisari Marjam mu'çizaho dodem. Va Alloh ūro ʙa vasilai Ruhulquddus, ja'ne ruhi imon jorī namud. Va agar Alloh mexost, mardume, ki ʙa'd az onho ʙudand, pas az on, ki xuççatho ʙar onon oşkor şuda ʙud, ʙo jakdigar çang namekardand. Vale onon ixtilof kardand. Pas ʙa'ze mu'min ʙudand va ʙa'ze kofir şudand. Va agar Alloh mexost, ʙo hamdigar çang namekardand. Ammo Alloh on cī ʙixohad ançom medihad
